verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> in my <S%H7879>complaint.<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> me from the <S%H5475>conspiracy<s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked,<s%> from the <S%H7285>noisy<s%> crowd of the ones <S%H6466>doing<s%> <S%H205>evil;<s%>
who <S%H8150>sharpen<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H1869>aim<s%> their <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> <S%H4751>deadly<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%>
to <S%H3384>shoot<s%> <S%H8535>innocent<s%> men from <S%H4565>ambushes.<s%> They <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at him <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> and <S%H3372>fearlessly.<s%>

They <S%H2388>encourage<s%> themselves in <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>plans.<s%> They <S%H5608>talk<s%> about <S%H2934>laying<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%> <S%H2934>secretly.<s%> They <S%H559>say,<s%> "Who will see <S%H7200>them?<s%>"

They <S%H2664>plot<s%> <S%H5766>injustice,<s%> <S%H8552>saying,<s%> "We have made a <S%H2664>perfect<s%> <S%H2665>plan!<s%>" Surely <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H7130>mind<s%> and <S%H7130>heart<s%> are <S%H6013>cunning.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at <S%H6597>them.<s%> They will be suddenly <S%H4347>struck<s%> down with an <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>
Their own <S%H3956>tongues<s%> shall <S%H3782>ruin<s%> <S%H7200>them.<s%> All who see them will shake their <S%H5074>heads.<s%>
All <S%H120>mankind<s%> shall be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> They shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall wisely <S%H7919>ponder<s%> what he has <S%H4639>done.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and shall take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3477>him.<s%> All the upright in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall praise <S%H1984>him!<s%>
